      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h1>Questions 3/5</h1>

<p>Please select whether you agree or disagree with each statement below.</p>

#macro( tablerows $label $var $test )
#if ( $test )
    #set( $bg = "#FFFFFF" )
    #set( $test = false )
#else
    #set( $bg = "#D2D2D2" )
    #set( $test = true )
#end 
<tr>
  <td bgcolor="$bg">$label
  #if ( $error.get($var) )
  <br><font color='#ff0000;'>Please answer this question.</font>
  #end
  </td>  <td></td>
  
  #foreach ( $col in [1..10])
    <td  bgcolor="$bg"><input type='radio' name='$var' value='$col' 
 #if ( $data.getLong( $var ) == $col )
   CHECKED="CHECKED"
#end   
    >
    </td>
  #end
</tr>
#end

#tablerows( "Before a good thing happens, I look forward to it in ways that give me pleasure in the present." "sav01")
#tablerows( "It's hard for me to hang onto a good feeling for very long." "sav02")
#tablerows( "I enjoy looking back on happy times from my past." "sav03")
#tablerows( "I don't like to look forward to good times too much before they happen." "sav04")
#tablerows( "I know how to make the most of a good time." "sav05")
#tablerows( "I don't like to look back at good times too much after they've taken place." "sav06")
#tablerows( "I feel a joy of anticipation when I think about upcoming good things." "sav07")
#tablerows( "When it comes to enjoying myself, I'm my own 'worst enemy'." "sav08")
#tablerows( "I can make myself feel good by remembering pleasant events from my past." "sav09")
#tablerows( "For me, anticipating what upcoming good events will be like is basically a waste of time." "sav10")
#tablerows( "When something good happens, I can make my enjoyment of it last longer by thinking or doing certain things." "sav11")
#tablerows( "When I reminisce about pleasant memories, I often start to feel sad or disappointed." "sav12")
#tablerows( "I can enjoy pleasant events in my mind before they actually occur." "sav13")
#tablerows( "I can't seem to capture the joy of happy moments." "sav14")
#tablerows( "I like to store memories of fun times that I go through so that I can recall them later." "sav15")
#tablerows( "It's hard for me to get very excited about fun times before they actually take place." "sav16")
#tablerows( "I feel fully able to appreciate good things that happen to me." "sav17")
#tablerows( "I find that thinking about good times from the past is basically a waste of time." "sav18")
#tablerows( "I can make myself feel good by imagining what a happy time that is about to happen will be like." "sav19")
#tablerows( "I don't enjoy things as much as I should." "sav20")
#tablerows( "It's easy for me to rekindle the joy from pleasant memories." "sav21")
#tablerows( "When I think about a pleasant event before it happens, I often start to feel uneasy or uncomfortable." "sav22")
#tablerows( "It's easy for me to enjoy myself when I want to." "sav23")
#tablerows( "For me, once a fun time is over and gone, it's best not to think about it." "sav24")
